contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 26, 1963 D Leigh Contest
Leigh Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
leigh-contest
None
St. Joseph's Hall, Leigh, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £25 and cup, 2nd £12 and cup, 3rd £8 and shield, 4th £3 and cup. Hymn tune contest - 1st Linthwaite, 2nd Haigh. Best local - Tyldesley. 7 bands competed.
May 18, 2015, 8:24 p.m. Sept. 27, 2016, 11:29 a.m.
1 Haigh Prize Victor Preston
2 Hepworth (Cookson Homes) A. H. Beardsell
3 Linthwaite Silver Band John Willie Morley
4 Bedford (Leigh) Band J. Denton
Unknown Result Skelmersdale Prize Band William Lyon
Unknown Result Hade Edge Ken Aiken-Jones
Unknown Result Tyldesley Band Fred Martland
